original_text: Then I saw, and considered it well: I looked upon it, and received instruction.
korean_text: 내가 보고 생각이 깊었고 내가 보고 훈계를 받았노라

sentences.original_text: Then I saw, and considered it well:
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 보고, 그것을 잘 살펴보았다:

sentences.original_text: I looked upon it, and received instruction.
